publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2178 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Criminal Legal Aid (Scotland) (Prescribed Proceedings) Amendment Regulations 2001-That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Criminal Legal Aid (Scotland) (Prescribed Proceedings) Amendment Regulations 2001 be approved. Supported by: Iain Gray*
